short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that automatically calculates your Canvas grades and GPA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grade Calculation Made Simple:
The Canvas GPA Calculator is designed to streamline your academic productivity. It automatically tracks your Canvas grades and calculates your course and overall GPA, even on courses that have auto-grading turned of by default. No more tedious manual calculations!

Features:
 - Automatic Grade Tracking: Seamlessly imports your Canvas grades.
 - Accurate GPA Calculation: Calculates your GPA based on your course grades.
 - User-Friendly Interface: Easy to use and navigate.

Take control of your academic success with the easy-to-use Canvas GPA Calculator.

**Note: This extension is only meant to work for the students of The Hotchkiss School. If the extension does not work as intended, please submit a detailed bug report in the Github below:**

https://github.com/gavin-ho1/canvas-gpa-calculator

Made by Gavin Ho
